idea-plugin.name: Base16 Material Lighter
idea-plugin.vendor: Nate Peterson, Chris Kempson, and Shirom Makkad
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Material Lighter for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Nate Peterson. Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
